descriptionHtml:
============================================================================================
[color=red]ATTENTION: I am no longer working on this mod.
Reason: i have found this: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35192/
And i strongly recommend you all to get this RAIT NAO :D[/color]
============================================================================================

Hello guys. This is just a small mod i made for myself, but decided to share it on Nexus, even if there is a mod like mine.
It adds a large ice spire northwest of Winterhold, with a throne on it's top. It is supposed to be a frozen throne for the Lich King characters for roleplay purposes.

============================================================================================

Recommended mods:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25696/ Bigger and Badder LICH KING Collectors Edition
(LK armor you see on a screenshot is from this mod)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6348/ Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor
(This is an option too, altrough i like the first one more)

============================================================================================

Bugs:
Unfortunatley, i haven't found a way to create LOD for it, so the spire will not be visible from great distances. If anyone knows how to create LOD not in a custom worldspace, please let me know.

============================================================================================

Compatibility:
Should be combatible with everything, since this mod is only adding some new stuff.

============================================================================================

Thanks for your attention, and have fun! :)
author: Half-Virus
